short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeshAIR is a new way to buy discount airfare. For those looking to travel, we can offer up to 30% off each ticket purchased.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically find the best prices on airfare from your favorite airlines. 

🔎 Search your favorite travel portals and airline websites for available fares and we will alert you if we can offer the fare cheaper directly from the airline.

🖥️ The CodeshAIR browser extension provides a new way to buy discount airfare for up to 30% off each ticket purchased.

💵 Once you purchase, we immediately go to work with the airline to secure your discounted fare. 

🎇 The more tickets you purchase on one reservation the more money you will save! 

Want better prices on your next flight? CodeshAIR makes it easy to find the best deals for your next family vacation, single adventure or even work trip.
